name: Indi Tandoori Paneer
description: Enjoy your favourite hot & spicy pizza, now with the goodness of our new Ragi Super Crust. Made with 100% Mozzarella Cheese & topped with tandoori Paneer, crisp Capsicum, spicy red Paprika & garnished with mint mayo. Our delicious Ragi crust is also packed with super-seeds such as Sunflower, Watermelon, Pumpkin & Flax seeds for extra touch of goodness.

name: Veggie Paradise
description: Enjoy your favourite pizza, now with the goodness of our new Ragi Super Crust. Made with 100% Mozzarella Cheese & topped with golden Corn, crisp Capsicum, black Olives & spicy red Paprika. Our delicious Ragi crust is also packed with super-seeds such as Sunflower, Watermelon, Pumpkin & Flax seeds for extra touch of goodness.

name: Peppy Paneer
description: Relish our all-time bestseller, now with the goodness of our new Ragi Super Crust. Made with 100% Mozzarella Cheese & topped with masala Paneer, crisp Capsicum & spicy red Paprika. Our delicious Ragi crust is also packed with super-seeds such as Sunflower, Watermelon, Pumpkin & Flax seeds for extra touch of goodness.

name: Margherita

name: Farmhouse
description: Relish our all-time bestseller, now with the goodness of our new Ragi Super Crust. Our delicious Ragi crust is also packed with super-seeds such as Sunflower, Watermelon, Pumpkin & Flax seeds for extra touch of goodness.
